title: 2 WEEKS FREE!!! COME BY & SEE OUR BEAUTIFUL 2 BEDROOM TODAY!
posting_body: ['Belmont Station Apartments', '1304 West 2nd Street', 'Los Angeles, California 90026', 'show contact info', 'SPECIAL: 2 WEEKS FREE for vacant and on-notice units on 12 Month Lease* (On-Notice Units: Must Move in within 7 day of unit becoming vacant.)', 'Looking for more information?', 'Find us at: https://essexapts.info/Belmont-Station', 'We are open!', 'Now offering self-guided and virtual tours!', 'Call today!', 'Apartment Details:', 'Unit Number: 249', '2 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms', 'Approximately 923 sq.', 'ft.', '$2,757* on a 12 month lease', 'We offer 1 to 12 month leases!', 'Come See this Beautiful Studio Apartment Home!', 'Complete hard surface flooring', 'Features include custom cabinetry, designer lighting, and granite counter-tops.', 'Your kitchen comes fully equipped and every unit features a new stainless steel refrigerator, dishwasher, electric stove, microwave and its own washer and dryer.', 'Escape to your very own oasis and call Belmont Station your new home!', 'THE ESSEX DIFFERENCE', '30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee', 'We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee with any leased apartment.', 'If you’re not 100% satisfied with your new home, we’ll help you transfer to a comparable home within the same community or you can choose to terminate your\u202flease.*', 'On-Site Maintenance', 'From replacing a light bulb to fixing an after-hours water leak, we are here for our residents.', 'Our maintenance team provides on-site support to keep your apartment and our community running smoothly.', 'We’re even available 24/7 for emergency issues that might arise.', 'At Essex, we’ve got you covered.', 'Why drag your furry friend to the dog park miles away just for some play time when you can have one of the biggest private dog parks in the city right outside your back door?', 'Both you & your buddy can have it all!', '(Size and breed restrictions apply)', 'Nearby Locations:', 'Staples Center, Convention Center, Korea Town, Arts District, Flower District, Toy District, USC, FIDM, Downtown LA, Hollywood, West Hollywood, Santa Monica, Chinatown, Union Station, World Trade Center, Fashion District, Jewelry District, Financial District, Little Tokyo, Pershing Square, Metro Station, Dodger Stadium, Grand Central Market, Echo Park, Silverlake', 'We offer tour everyday but Sunday!', "Floor plans are artist's renderings and actual floor plans may differ from renderings.", 'All room dimensions are approximations only.', '*Pricing Availability and Move-in specials subject to change without notice.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
